name: Floppy bird (Popolon)
description:
fight physics forces, avoid ball collision to go to the right side of the screen. River and bubbles can help to protect you, but you have limited oxygen resources so don't dive too long in water.

Use arrow keys to move.

s key show/hide wind conditions or action a menu item

This is a Tic-80 fantasy-computer game, so you can access source code by quitting the game (esc key, quit, and esc key again).

That's a first version, for my first published game, I will probably improve it a little. If you don't like at all something, I like very negative critics too ^^.
